items.title: NASA’s Deep Space Communications Demo Exceeds Project Expectations
items.content_text: The project has exceeded all of its technical goals after two years, setting up the foundations of high-speed communications for NASA’s future human missions to Mars.

items.title: NASA’s Tally of Planets Outside Our Solar System Reaches 6,000
items.content_text: The milestone highlights the accelerating rate of discoveries, just over three decades since the first exoplanets were found.

items.title: NASA Says Mars Rover Discovered Potential Biosignature Last Year
items.content_text: After a year’s worth of scientific scrutiny, the ‘Sapphire Canyon’ rock sample remains the mission’s best candidate for containing signs of ancient microbial life processes.

items.title: August 2025 Company Update
items.content_text: Throughout August, the Terran R program continued to make measurable progress toward first launch, delivering on critical program milestones. items.title: July 2025 Company Update
items.content_text: As development of Terran R continues to accelerate, July marked another month of meaningful progress across design, manufacturing, testing, and launch operations. items.content_text: As the Terran R program continues to advance, we’re highlighting some of the latest milestones across design, build, test, and launch.
